text.text: Make shopping experience a lovable one.

With mass internet adoption and high smartphone penetration, the Middle East & North Africa (MENA) region has adopted new innovations at a very high pace. Businesses, on the other hand, couldn't progress at the same pace of the digital transformation. Innovative startups, or the so-called disruptors were there to fill the gap. We, at Floki Solutions, witnessed a need for digitization at the highest layer of the grocery business architecture.

Having launched in 2017 and being among the first comers to the e-grocery market has allowed us to optimize our e-commerce skills in technology, operations, and digital marketing. Following 3 years of deep learning, and based on all the data collected throughout our journey, we reached a point in which we could clearly identify the requirements needed to make it through. And here comes FLOKI, a new project we would gladly like to introduce. A turnkey e-commerce solution, supported by the skill set to create success stories.
